Welcome: Welcome to the Monthly Car PaymentCalculator!
LoanAmount: What is your loan amount total
WrongValue: Please enter a total in the format of dollars.cents
LoanDuration:
Please enter the duration of your loan in years.  
 If loan duration is not in an even number of years, add .083 for each additional month.

WrongAPR: Please enter your APR in the format of a single number
MoreCalculation: Would you like to calculate another loan?
ChooseYesOrNo: You must choose 1 for yes or 2 for no.
